title: Hanes Men's Beefy-T T-Shirt, Heavyweight Cotton Tee, 1 Or 2 Pack, Big & Tall
description: HANES QUALITY - Men’s tees are made with a high-density stitch count, double-needle stitching, and shoulder-to-shoulder taping.
HOLDS ITS SHAPE - The ribbed crewneck lays flat and holds its shape for a tee that's made to last.
ROOM TO MOVE - A full cut in these men’s undershirts gives you extra room to move.
COTTON GOODNESS - Soft and strong 6-oz. ringspun cotton feels great for comfort that lasts. (Heathered colors are a cotton blend.)
BIG & TALL SIZES - Need more room? These classic men's short-sleeve tees are available in Big Men's sizes up to 6XL.
COLD WATER WASH - Hanes recommends washing this men's t-shirt in cold water to reduce energy usage.

For over 45 years, Hanes®’ Beefy-T® classic cotton tee has set the standard for T-shirt comfort and quality. Today this unisex tee is better than ever, offering even greater durability and fit. The ultra-soft, 100% cotton T-shirt in 6.1.oz. jersey is a great weight that's beefy indeed. It feels soft against your skin and will continue to feel that way for a long time, getting softer with every washing. With a full-cut for a roomier fit that lets you move with ease, this short-sleeve crewneck tee is made to last, with durable double stitching at the sleeves and hem. Available in 30 colors, this is a better-than-basic cotton tee to stock up on and wear everywhere.
